title: BMW U.S. boss bets on another record sales year despite Q3 slump
description: A recall-related stop-sale in the third quarter flipped BMW brand's 3.1 percent first-half sales increase into a 0.2 percent decline after nine months.
author: Urvaksh Karkaria
excerpt: A recall-related stop-sale in the third quarter flipped BMW brand's 3.1 percent first-half sales increase into a 0.2 percent decline after nine months.
